channel.title: Dialogflow API on Juan Antonio Estival - Solutions Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Dialogflow API on Juan Antonio Estival - Solutions Architect

item.title: Dialogflow API Postman
item.description: Open Postman Create a Post/get Request From Authorization folder choose OAUTh 2.0 Autenticate with user owner and password Click on use token Example of GET requests List Agents This is an example of list agentes GET https://global-dialogflow.googleapis.com/v3/projects/hospitality-demo-361210/locations/global/agents/ Example of POST Request Agent Intents belongs to sessions POSR https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/reference/rest/v3/projects.locations.agents.environments.sessions { "queryInput": { "text": { "text": "HELLO" }, "languageCode": "en" }, "queryParams": { "timeZone": "America/Los_Angeles" } } Answer
